reviewText: IT IS A VERY GOOD MOVE THANK YOU
One of the best books that I have read in a very long time.  Once I picked it up, I could not put it back down.  The book was far better than the movie.

I appreciate the movie TAR, I'm really feeling the soundtrack. It would've been better with more appearences of Ron Brice! I overstand TAR because it's on the contrary to the average white supremist Bulls**t! I really love ''Ron Brice'',I wish that most of you people would stop sleeping on his great talent!!  1 LOVE...nj
Although, this movie flopped, I really liked it. Nicole Prescott is a great actress and I'd like to see her get more recognition. Kevin Thigpen also is a good actor.

This was a wonderful movie to watch.  My opinion may be biased because I am a huge fan of Kevin Thigpen.  Kevin is a brilliant actor and a good friend of mine, who unfortunately, isn't widely known.  He gave a fine performance in this film as Curtis Brisby.  This is definitely one to have in your video library.
